# Issue 3034: improved cleaning code for Debian packages

archive/issues_003034.json:
```json
{
    "body": "Some of the \"upstream\" tarballs automatically generated by sage-debsource aren't entirely clean; I've added code to run debuild clean before generating the upstream tarball.  \n\nAlso, cddlib's clean target should use distclean.\n\n**Assignee:** @timabbott\n\nIssue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/3034\n\n",
    "closed_at": "2008-04-27T05:22:17Z",
    "created_at": "2008-04-26T22:23:24Z",
    "labels": [
        "component: debian-package",
        "bug"
    ],
    "milestone": "https://github.com/sagemath/sage/milestones/sage-3.0.1",
    "title": "improved cleaning code for Debian packages",
    "type": "issue",
    "url": "https://github.com/sagemath/sage/issues/3034",
    "user": "https://github.com/timabbott"
}
```
Some of the "upstream" tarballs automatically generated by sage-debsource aren't entirely clean; I've added code to run debuild clean before generating the upstream tarball.  

Also, cddlib's clean target should use distclean.

**Assignee:** @timabbott

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/3034
